author: Prakash Kamat
text:
The Goa Children’s Court on Thursday granted Pop singer Remo Fernandes anticipatory bail in a case relating to the verbal abuse of a minor girl.

The court directed that in the event of his arrest, Mr. Fernandes be released on a bail of Rs.50,000 with a surety of the like amount to the satisfaction of the investigating officer. The court directed him to deposit his passport with police till the charge sheet is filed. The court asked him to report to the Agacaim Police Station for 10 days from Friday.
title: Singer Remo gets anticipatory bail
